Execute Training¶

run_training.main(args)[source]¶

Main function to train the models. If the training is already completed, it will print a message and exit. Otherwise, it will create a task list for each surrogate model and train the models sequentially or in parallel depending on the number of devices.

Parameters:

args (Namespace) – The command line arguments.

CODES Benchmark
